title: setValueForProperty @ DOMPropertyOperations.js:142 throwing untraceable/unpausable error
body:
Hey there,

I am getting the following error many time over in my console:

```
Error: <path> attribute d: Expected number, "…A 111 111 0 0 1 NaN NaN L NaN Na…".
setValueForProperty @ DOMPropertyOperations.js:142

__webpack_require__ @ bootstrap 333c997…:659

DOMPropertyOperations.js:142 Error: <path> attribute transform: Expected number, "…ate(0,0) rotate(NaN,0,0) "
```

I've tried setting "pause on exceptions to true", but it doesn't seem to pause on the error. The actual error message itself is very unhelpful for debugging what the underlying issue is because I have many places in my component where I am rendering an svg path:
`Error: <path> attribute d: Expected number, "…A 111 111 0 0 1 NaN NaN L NaN Na…".`

Any help tracking down which <path> component is actually causing this error would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!!
